Text: MANY THANKX TT. YOU ARE APPRECIATED
Many, many thanks...truly it is always a blessing. I appreciate it so much.
Thank you for the blessings but do you have Alexis Spight new cd.
I noticed that there is one song missing from the Glenn Packiam-The Mystery of Faith: 03-The Nicene Creed. Was this intentionally left out or an error...thanks again

Alltojah, I would never intentionally leave out songs.  Ever.  Because, for all I know, maybe that omitted song would be the difference maker in someone's life to draw them nearer to the Lord.

Unfortunately I wasn't aware that the track was missing.  It came to me that way.  :(
Clardx1, I snooped around for that new Alexis Spight album for you.  So far nothing.  Sorry about that.  I'll keep watch for it though, and include it in my 2013 bundles if/when I come across it.
